message.content:
I need to identify the specific line items and value of the total amount of tax the entity is expected to pay or recover during the reporting period.

Looking at the financial statements provided:

1. In the balance sheet, I see "Taxes Payable" with an End_amount of 1,428,630.43 as of 2024-02-05.

2. In the cash flow statement, I see "Increase (Decrease) in Tax Payable" of 1,428,630.43 as of 2024-02-05.

3. Most importantly, in the income statement, I see "Tax Expense" with an Amount of 1,428,630.43 as of 2024-02-05.

The tax expense in the income statement represents the total amount of tax the entity is expected to pay during the reporting period. This is the value I need to identify.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '1428630.43'} }
```
